title: Two epystles one of Henry Bullynger, wyth the consent of all the lernyd men of the Churche of Tigury: another of Ihon Caluyn, cheffe preacher of the church of Geneue: whether it be lawfull for a Chrysten man to communycate or be pertaker of the masse of the Papysts, wythout offendyng God and hys neyghboure, or not.
author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
notes: Place of publication from and printer's name and publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 4081 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
